abstract: Fishing and mining interests look to take advantage of new opportunities for commerce and trade as result of newly accessible Arctic Ocean; this has been made possible as global warming continues to melt the polar ice sheet, opening new sea lanes and making the few previously navigable routes available more months of the year.
snippet: As global warming melts the polar ice sheet, shipping, fishing and mining interests are looking to take advantage of the newly accessible Arctic Ocean.
lead_paragraph: As global warming melts the polar ice sheet, shipping, fishing and mining interests are looking to take advantage of the newly accessible Arctic Ocean.

headline.main: Warming Revives Dream of Sea Route in Russian Arctic
headline.print_headline: Amid the Peril, a Dream Fulfilled
headline.seo: Warming Revives Old Dream of Sea Route in Russian Arctic
